name.description: Identifies the name of the cinema

addr:city.description: Identifies in term of cites the position of the cinema

addr:housenumber.description: Identifies the hosenumber of the cinema

addr:postcode.description: Identifies the postcode of the cites where the cinema is located

addr:street.description: Identifies the street name where the cinema is located

GeoCoordinates.description: Coordinates of the location in EPSG 4326 projection standard
